item.title: CVE-2021-37909|2024-08-04T01:30:08.999Z -- changing%20inc. -- tssservisignadapter
item.description: WriteRegistry function in TSSServiSign component does not filter and verify usersâ€™ input, remote attackers can rewrite to the registry without permissions thus perform hijack attacks to execute arbitrary code.
